PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-06552022-06-10TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Life Saving Equipment Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the LIFE SAVING EQUIPMENT REGULATIONS in order to require the vessel to operate only in months where the monthly historical average daily minimum air temperature is greater than zero degrees Celsius in order to qualify for the two-year extended servicing period for all inflatable survival equipment.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0136 Publication Date: 2022-06-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Life Saving Equipment Regulations
